Jeddah (JED) is in the **Arabia Standard Time (AST)** zone (UTC+3), while New York (JFK) is in **Eastern Time (ET)** (UTC-5). A flight departing New York late at night on **February 14** could arrive in Jeddah **early on February 15**, **local time**, due to the 8-hour time difference and long flight duration (~12+ hours).
